name: We Keepers of Lost Things
description:
A game that fits on a business card!

Ideally, I'd be able to hand out business cards in person, but for now it's more of an idle dream. All the same, here is a tiny game that you can carry around in your pocket, ready to go at any time!

Tell someone about something that you have lost. Trade that lost item with them, and keep it safe on their behalf.
